data.message:
"my grand finale" really? No more detox? I bet this is Detox but he realised there's no way it could live up to all the hype so he just changed the name to "Compton" and acted like he was inspired by a movie (pretty quick turn around to put a whole new album together). Fair enough too cuz even if he made something comparable to all eyez on me it still wouldn't live up to the hype surrounding Detox
#strongeverything
Josh Ridgway Ma'i Lampard Pomate Huy Quach Moe Eryilmaz Anthony Qan Hong

replies.message: Probably still gonna be a classic tbh if eminem don't do no new weird ass flow/delivery
a year after compton is released and if it does well, which it will, Dre will turn around and go "oh btw that was detox the whole time lol"
In b4 he gives the throw away detox beats to eminem n he releases mmlp3
so no detox? has he said anything regarding detox after breakin this news
